title: The Mind of man
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Brain
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Nervous system
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mind and body
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cerebral dominance
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mind control
description: A survey of modern research on the mind in various countries of the world. Covers areas of mind development in children, effects of drugs, dreams, brain structure, the brain and sexuality, reasoning, and the power of the mind in controlling bodily functions. Includes interviews with Sir John Eccles, Donald Hebb and B.F. Skinner. Introduced by Magnus Magnusson, commentary by Marius Goring.
